articles.author: Reuters Editorial
articles.title: NFL notebook: Jets GM lauds Darnold, hints at possible QB trade
articles.description: With Sam Darnold eyeing the New York Jets' starting quarterback job halfway through the preseason, general manager Mike Maccagnan offered tremendous praise for the No. 3 overall pick on Monday.

articles.author: Reuters Editorial
articles.title: China stocks close higher, technology leads gains
articles.description: China stocks extended their gains on Tuesday, led by technology, consumer and financial stocks, as risk appetite improved on signs the government will relax monetary and fiscal policies to counter the impact of Sino-U.S. trade friction.

articles.author: Reuters Editorial
articles.title: UK trade minister - EU risks hurting image with Brexit handling: Sky News
articles.description: British trade minister Liam Fox said on Tuesday that the European Union risks damaging its standing in the world if it pursues a Brexit that puts its own "ideological purity" ahead of needs of its citizens.

articles.author: Amanda Cooper
articles.title: UPDATE 4-Oil steady as demand outlook counters boost from Iran sanctions
articles.description: Oil held steady on Tuesday, as the prospect of price support from U.S. sanctions on Iran was offset by concern about the outlook for demand, particularly in light of the trade dispute between Washington and Beijing.

articles.author: Ayai Tomisawa
articles.title: Nikkei drops as yen rises after Trump rate comment; U.S.-China talks eyed
articles.description: Japan's Nikkei dropped on Tuesday morning as a stronger yen hurt risk sentiment, with cyclical stocks such as shippers, machinery stocks and automakers losing ground.

articles.author: Huw Jones
articles.title: Britain can't afford to close door to EU banks after Brexit
articles.description: Britain is expected to keep the door open for European Union banks and investors after Brexit to try to preserve London's global financial clout, irrespective of whether it gets a good trade deal from the bloc, bankers and industry officials say.

articles.author: Shinichi Saoshiro
articles.title: Asia stocks capped, dollar droops following Trump comments
articles.description: Asian stocks were capped and the dollar dipped on Tuesday after U.S. President Donald Trump accused China and Europe of manipulating their currencies and said he was "not thrilled" with the Federal Reserve for hiking interest rates.

articles.author: Shinichi Saoshiro
articles.title: Asia stocks capped, dollar droops following Trump comments
articles.description: Asian stocks were capped and the dollar dipped on Tuesday after U.S. President Donald Trump accused China and Europe of manipulating their currencies and said he was "not thrilled" with the Federal Reserve for hiking interest rates.

articles.author: Ahmed Rasheed and Ahmed Aboulenein
articles.title: Exclusive: Iraq to ask U.S. for exemptions on some Iran sanctions
articles.description: Iraq's economy is so closely linked to Iran that Baghdad is going to ask Washington for permission to ignore some U.S. sanctions on its neighbor, Iraqi government and central bank officials said.

articles.author: David Shepardson and David Lawder
articles.title: Foreign automakers oppose Trump NAFTA plan as U.S-Mexico talks resume
articles.description: Foreign-brand automakers with U.S. plants do not support Trump administration rules to raise the amount of local content in North American-made vehicles, a group representing companies including Toyota Motor Corp , Volkswagen AG and Hyundai Motor Co  has told…

articles.author: Daniel Leussink
articles.title: FOREX-Dollar slips, yen strengthens on Trump's Fed criticism
articles.description: The dollar slipped against the yen and a basket of major peers on Tuesday after U.S. President Donald Trump said he was "not thrilled" with Federal Reserve Chairman Jerome Powell for raising interest rates.

articles.author: Daniel Leussink
articles.title: FOREX-Dollar slips, yen strengthens on Trump's Fed criticism
articles.description: The dollar slipped against the yen and a basket of major peers on Tuesday after U.S. President Donald Trump said he was "not thrilled" with Federal Reserve Chairman Jerome Powell for raising interest rates.

articles.author: Tom Finn
articles.title: FOREX-Dollar falls after Trump criticizes Fed
articles.description: The dollar weakened on Tuesday after U.S. President Donald Trump criticized the head of the Federal Reserve for raising interest rates.

articles.author: David Shepardson
articles.title: RPT-Foreign automakers oppose Trump NAFTA plan as U.S-Mexico talks resume
articles.description: Foreign-brand automakers with U.S. plants do not support Trump administration rules to raise the amount of local content in North American-made vehicles, a group representing companies including Toyota Motor Corp , Volkswagen AG and Hyundai Motor Co has told …

articles.author: Reuters Editorial
articles.title: Russia to start delivering S-400 defence system to Turkey in 2019 - Ifax
articles.description: Russia will begin delivering its advanced S-400 missile defense system to Turkey in 2019, the Interfax news agency cited Russia's state arms exporter Rosoboronexport as saying on Tuesday.

articles.author: Reuters Editorial
articles.title: China c.bank says will keep liquidity reasonably ample
articles.description: China's central bank said on Tuesday that it will keep liquidity reasonably ample but will not resort to strong policy stimulus.

articles.author: Reuters Editorial
articles.title: JPMorgan undercuts discount brokerages on trades
articles.description: JPMorgan Chase & Co, in a bid to lure customers from the discount brokerage industry, said on Tuesday it will begin offering free stock trades for self-managed accounts through its Chase mobile banking app starting next week.

articles.author: Reuters Editorial
articles.title: Sterling boosted by drop in dollar, but Brexit negotiations weigh
articles.description: The British pound rose to a near two-week high on Tuesday after the dollar fell following comments from U.S. President Donald Trump that he was unhappy with the Federal Reserve for raising interest rates.

articles.title: Sterling boosted by drop in dollar, but Brexit negotiations weigh
articles.description: The British pound rose to a near two-week high on Tuesday after the dollar fell following comments from U.S. President Donald Trump that he was unhappy with the Federal Reserve for raising interest rates.

articles.author: Reuters Editorial
articles.title: Swiss stocks - Factors to watch on Aug 21
articles.description: Here are some of the main factors that may affect Swiss stocks on Tuesday:
